Articles.Content: Hello there, I've been lurking this forum for almost a year, so I finally decided to register at last. I'm from Italy and I have 173 playing hours on record (kind of noob I guess). I'm currently trying to build an efficient SSTO capable of bringing heavy payloads in LKO. See you out there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
See you in orbit my friend!
